issue_comments.author: dagar
issue_comments.body:
Thanks @AndreasAntener 
Is there a better place a helper like item_contains_position() could live in navigator? At the moment I made it public and static within MissionBlock so it was accessible from MissionFeasibilityChecker.

issue_comments.author: AndreasAntener
issue_comments.body: Only idea I'd have would be to add a helper class, but it's a bit overkill atm for one method. Maybe add a comment about it.

review_comments.author: AndreasAntener
review_comments.body: We could use https://github.com/PX4/Firmware/blob/master/src/modules/navigator/mission_block.cpp#L318 and also add NAV_CMD_DO_JUMP to the list there (it's currently not because it's handled separately in missions but adding it won't have any other effect)
